bug.title: With a given combination of widgets, it is impossible to set the required size of two widgets l= 1x2, l=2x2
bug.environment: Samsung Galaxy A32, Android 11 (A325FXXU2AUK3) 4x5, screen zoom min, font size min
bug.STR: 1.Open the app 2.Tap ADD WIDGET button 3.Click button [Добавить] on appeared menu 4.Tap ADD WIDGET 6 times 5.Go to the active homescreen 6.long tap the added widget (1) and try to resize it to l=1 x 2 7.long tap the added widget (2) and try to resize it to l=2 x 2
bug.AR: 1. Widget (1) can’t be resized to l=1 x 2 (only l= 1 x 1 or l= 1 x 3) onn 4x5, screen zoom min, font size min 2. Widget (2) can’t be resized to l=2 x 2 (only l= 2 x 1 or l= 2 x 3) on 4x5, screen zoom min, font size min
bug.ER: Widget (1) should be resizable to l=1 x 2 and Widget (2) should be resizable to l=2 x 2 if homescreen grid size allows
